title: Ticket #1971: RFE: implement a "-address <schedd-sinful>" argument for condor_submit
description: Allowing a user to directly specify the <ip:port> of a schedd to submit against would make it more convenient to implement some scenarios for achieving high submission volumes, particularly in multi-schedd environments. It would also make it consistent with the "-addr" option for condor_rm.
